item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:10, topic:459919”]Go to ClickingButtons and import it, like this:
import server.model.players.quests.NewYears;

The other way that I said works aswell, but this is probably easier for you.[/quote]Okay, I imported it… How does that help anything?
I want it to read my “NewYears” file when I click on that button. How do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Go to ClickingButtons and import it, like this:
import server.model.players.quests.NewYears;

The other way that I said works aswell, but this is probably easier for you.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Oww my head hurts.
Dude I don’t know if it’s because I really don’t know this or if it’s my head ache or if I just need a break from coding.
But please go into a little more detail…?
Just listing those doesn’t help me, how would I make clicking on a button(coded in ClickingButtons) load my file “NewYears”?

Read full topic

showInformation();

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Make public void showInformation() static and call it from your clickingButtons class.

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:4, topic:459919”]What do you mean by “NewYears file?” Are you talking about the quest interface that should appear that gives directions of the quest and what to do?[/quote]LOLOL, no dude. Read the guide: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/308148-pi-cooks-assistant-quest.html
it’s literally the 1, 2 & 3ed codes BB’s. He has posted…
I want it to where when I click on the button in server, it gets redirected to follow what my “NewYears” file is saying.

P.S. I renamed his quest from CooksAssistant to NewYears.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quests Help

@mista_pnut wrote:

What do you mean by “NewYears file?” Are you talking about the quest interface that should appear that gives directions of the quest and what to do?

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay thank you, as you’ve already seen I have the interfaces and stuff to open the “Quest Menu” when I click on it in my quest tab…
This [ftp=ftp://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/308148-pi-cooks-assistant-quest.html]Quest Guide[/ftp] I am following made me create a quest folder in “src\server\model\players\quests\NewYears” and if you read the guide at all, then it is saying in there about the QuestStages I requested… BUT! I have the stuff I need in ClickingButtons, how do I make it where, by clicking a That Button in ClickingButtons it opens my “NewYears” file?

I’M SORRY IF THIS IS UNCLEAR! The last sentence is really all you need, if you know how to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

#1. I’m not sure what you’re wanting, maybe if you’ve completed part of the quest is says something specific? In that case just add restrictions such as

if(questStage == 1){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("You must now defeat Elvarg!", 8146); } if(questStage == 2){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("[s]You must now defeat Elvarg![/s]". 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Congratulations! Quest Complete!", 8147); }

#2. Wherever NPCs are handled,

if (npcs[i].npcType == xxxx && questStage == 1) { questStage = 2; //also, sending a dialogue here would be a nice addition }

#3. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509449.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quests Help
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay guys, I know there are guide but I am just requesting a few things.
[size=36pt]#1. [/size]In clickingbuttons.java I have added:

//ACHIEVEMENT QUESTS //START "Holiday" events case 114112: //New years c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ New Years Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114113: //Valentine's Day c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Valentine's Day Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114114: //Easter c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Easter Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114115: //St. Pat's c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ St. Patrick's Day Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114116: //Halloween c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Halloween Event (Beware) ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114117: //Veteran's Day c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Veteran's Day Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114118: //Thanksgiving c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Thanksgiving Day Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114119: //Christmas c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Chriatmas Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; //END "Holiday" events. //Start "Player's" Quests case 114121: //WildcanbeDang c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Wilderness can be Dangerous ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114122: //Grim Reaper's Revenge c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Grim Reaper's Revenge ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114123: //Underneath a Rock c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Underneath a Rock ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Lure's Pride ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114124: //Spider's Revenge c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Spider's Revenge ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Lure's Pride ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; case 114125: //Lure's Pride c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Lure's Pride ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); break; //End "Player's" Quests //Start "Member's" Quests case 114127: //LegitP if (c.isDonator >= 1) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Become a Legit Player ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a Member to view this quest."); } break; case 114128: //LegitD if (c.isDonator >= 1) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Become a Legit Donator ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator to view this quest."); } break; case 114129: //LegitS if (c.isDonator >= 1) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Become a Legit Staff ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a member of Staff to view this quest."); } break; case 114130: //LegitV if (c.playerRights == 5) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ Become a Legit Veteran ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start BLAH",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part1",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part2",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Part3",8148); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be a Veteran to view this quest."); } break; //End "Member's" Quests //END QUESTS
How do I make it recognized Part 1, 2, 3. Etc. (Quest Stages)
Please be descriptive.
[size=36pt]#2.[/size] How do I make it where you have to go kill certain NPC in order to HELP move you onto next quest part?
Please in depth.
[size=36pt]#3.[/size] This has to do with Dialogue options, when talking to a NPC, and he give you options to choose, when clicking on an option, where do I put the action for clicking on it? And how do I know What I am clicking on exactly?

Thanks for reading that’s all I need then I can finish up these quests!

Read full topic
